select
from sys_menu_info sm where sm.type != 3 and sm.id in ( select distinct menu_id from sys_role_to_menu r2m where r2m.role_id in ( select role_id from sys_role_to_user r2u where r2u.user_id=#{userId} ) )

select perms from sys_menu_info sm where sm.type = 3 and sm.id in ( select distinct menu_id from sys_role_to_menu r2m where r2m.role_id in ( select role_id from sys_role_to_user r2u where r2u.user_id=#{userId} ) )
